task.title: Opening the MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective

taskbody.context: The MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective is normally opened automatically, but in the event you need to open it manually you open it like any other Eclipse perspective.

step.cmd: Bring up the Open Perspective dialog by doing one of the following:

choices.choice: Click Open Perspective ( ), located in the top right corner of the MOTODEV Studio window, and select Other.
From the Window menu, select Open Perspective Other

step.cmd: In the Open Perspective dialog, click MOTODEV Studio for Android and then click OK.
step.stepresult: The MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective is displayed.

postreq.note:
For further information on how to use, create, customize and configure perspectives, refer to the Eclipse documentation:
Select Help Contents from the Help menu.
Select Workbench User GuideGetting StartedBasic Tutorial Perspectives.
